original_text: I would like every one of you to speak in tongues, but I would rather have you prophesy. The one who prophesies is greater than the one who speaks in tongues, unless someone interprets, so that the church may be edified.
korean_text: 나는 너희가 다 방언 말하기를 원하나 특별히 예언하기를 원하노라 만일 방언을 말하는 자가 통역하여 교회의 덕을 세우지 아니하면 예언하는 자만 못하니라

sentences.original_text: I would like every one of you
but I would rather have you prophesy
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 너희가 예언하기를 더 원한다

sentences.original_text: is greater than one who speaks in tongues
so that the church may be edified
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 교회가 세움을 받게 하려 함이라
